major: Node.js, TypeScript, Express.js, PostgresSQL, Angular, AWS

notes: Course Final project, Emotion Detection (using images): worked with a team of four to design, implement, train, and evaluate a deep learning model to detect emotions from a set of labeled images. For this project we used python as a programming language utilizing numpy, pandas, matplotlib, kerase, TensorFlow, openCV, and Albumenations libraries. At the end we made a mode with 90% accuracy.
Graduated Magna Cum Laude, with a 3.77 CGPA. Excelled in all major related courses and grew an interest in AI and Computer Vision.
Started as an English as a Second Language (ESL) Student for the first year. Completed 43 credit hours towards a degree in medicine.
